name: Fireflies (itch) (Diego Escalante)
description:
Description:
Catch and release fireflies in the middle of the forest at night. Find a way to open the door in front of you. This is a very short game that is heavily focused on mood and atmospheric elements. Wear your headphones!

Jam Details:
This game was made in the month of November for the Github Game Off 2021 jam. The theme of the jam was "bug."

Links:
Jam Submission Page
Source Code

Tools Used:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Ableton
  • Jetbrains Rider
  • Alex Peterson's Spacescape
  • Earl Grey Tea
